mapper.select: select * from `pet-adoption`.account join `pet-adoption`.picture on account.picture_id = picture.pic_id order by account_id

select * from `pet-adoption`.pet pet join `pet-adoption`.bulletin b on b.bulletin_id = pet.bulletin_id join `pet-adoption`.picture p on p.pic_id = pet.picture_id where pet.is_delete = 0 and b.is_delete = 0 order by pet_id
select * from `pet-adoption`.pet join `pet-adoption`.want_adopt wa on pet.pet_id = wa.pet_id where wa.is_delete = 0 order by want_id
